description: Founded in 1985, Southern District Cricket Club, Darwin has a rich history of fostering cricketing talent and sportsmanship in Darwin. We are more than just a cricket club; we are a community dedicated to promoting the spirit of cricket, teamwork, and fair play. From our passionate senior teams to our vibrant junior programs, we strive for excellence on and off the field.
Our home ground, Marrara Cricket Ground, is a hub for cricket enthusiasts. We welcome players of all ages and skill levels.

options: ★★Darwin's South: Play Hard, Play Fair, Together.★★

mission: To provide a welcoming and competitive environment for cricketers of all ages and abilities in Darwin, fostering skill development, sportsmanship, and a lifelong love for the game, while actively contributing to our local community.
